Package gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule.pds4

Class CollectionInBundleRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule.AbstractValidationRule
      • gov.nasa.pds.tools.validate.rule.pds4.CollectionInBundleRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ValidationRule, org.apache.commons.chain.Command
    public class CollectionInBundleRule
extends AbstractValidationRule
    Implements a rule that iterates over subdirectories, treating each as a collection within a bundle, and applying the PDS4 collection rules for each.
